page.title: 19INTERVIEW LORD ABERGAVENNY
page.content: Lord Abergavenny's full name is Colonel the Marquess of Abergavenny K.G. O.B.E. J.P. Lord Abergavenny's typical day is not really a typical day because he is always doing something different every day. We asked him for a week in his life. On Monday we went to see him, on Tuesday he was going to Brighton as the Lord Lieutenant to look after Princess Ann for the day and then he went on up to London. The next day he drove to Epsom to go to the Derby. On Thursday he went to the South of England show and on Friday he returned to Ardingly and stayed there for dinner because someone was leaving.
